headline: Etaily lands strategic investment from Japan’s SMBC - bringing total funding to $24M for Social Commerce enablement platform
summary: Manila, Dec. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- etaily, the Philippines’ digital-native retail platform, has secured new strategic investments led by Japan’s Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation (SMBC), through its SMBC Asia Rising fund, bringing its total funding to over $24 million. Other investors in this round include Kaya Founders, JGDEV of the Gokongwei Group as well as other notable Asia-based families. etaily enables some of the world’s best-known consumer brands in Southeast Asia, including Le
